item.title: [ #Project 1 ] UE5 Animation - Harvest Day
item.description: ROLE: Independent YEAR: 2023 TOOLS USED: Unreal Engine 5, DaVinci Resolve GENRE: Cinematic RESPONSIBILITY: Conduct preliminary research, and write scripts and storyboards. Use Quixel Bridge and marketplace kits to build scenes; create materials, animations, visual effects, etc. for the environment. Perform facial motion capture for MetaHuman characters; adjust camera animation. Edit the footage, and add music and sound effects. DESCRIPTION: This project is a 3D animated short film made in Unreal Engine 5.

item.title: [ #Project 2 ] Unity VR - The Peach Blossom Spring - Chinese brush painting effect
item.description: ROLE: Team Leader YEAR: 2022 TOOLS USED: Unity, Photoshop PLATFORM: Oculus Rift S RESPONSIBILITY: As a technical artist, I am responsible for the Chinese brush painting rendering scheme and optimization. I am also responsible for the final visual presentation of the game. and propose technical solutions for programmers to implement. As a designer, I design and implement the VR interaction scheme, and complete the UI design. As a programmer, I write scripts concerning gameplay / UI / visual effects with team member.

item.title: [ #Project 3 ] Hercraft - Creative Short Film
item.description: ROLE: Prop & Makeup Artist, 3D Animator, Digital Colorist YEAR: 2017 TOOLS USED: Cinema 4D, After Effects, DaVinci Resolve, Photoshop GENRE: Fanfic Short Film RESPONSIBILITY: Create a storyboard with the director and discuss the shooting plan. As a member of the film crew, I am responsible for making props, setting up scenes and making up the actress. I am also responsible for quality assurance of the takes and footage management.
